column3:
マッスル！オマエはガマンくらべを
見事耐え抜いたオトコ！
そんなオマエに より強くなるための
トレーニングがあるゴロ！
デスマウンテンの北にあるド根性ガケで
待ってるゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Ya did a good job stayin' strong during
my contest of ultimate endurance!

In fact, I devised the perfect training
program to help take your strength
to the next level!
I'll be waitin' for ya to take the Gut
Check Challenge. You'll find it to the
north of Death Mountain, brother.

column3:
マッスル！オマエ ここでオレに話すより
大事なこと忘れてないかゴロ？！
ド根性ガケ"登りにいけゴロ！！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Aren't ya forgettin' somethin' way
more important than chitchat?!

Go and take the Gut Check
Challenge already!

column3:
マッスル！オマエはガマンくらべとド根性ガケを
制覇した四人目のド根性兄弟！
そんなオマエにふさわしい
超ド根性ガケを準備しているゴロ！
さらなるマッスルを目指すゴロ！
column4:
PUMP IT UP, BROTHER!Ah, it's the fourth Goron Blood Brother!
He who beat the Gut Check Challenge
and the contest of ultimate endurance!
That's why I'm preparin' somethin'
worthy of a Goron brother like you.
I call it...Super Gut Check Challenge!
The more gains the merrier,
brother!
